title: Soft Launch Parameters
body:
In the following document you can find the proposed parameters values the soft launch of the DeFi Options protocol, along with detailed descriptions.

[Read more and comment here 👈](https://docs.google.com/document/d/13BfIzvQMKXIaZkKbMTGAn0ylOxRwPvWft2af6FkedI4/edit#)

For reference, below is a short copy of the proposed parameters:

[Proxy Administration]
30 days

[Circulating Supply]
23.000.000

[Allowed Tokens]
USDT, USDC and DAI

[Min Share For Proposal]
2.5 %

[Debt Interest Rate]
50% per year

[Credit Interest Rate]
15% per year

[Processing Fee]
0.5% per operation

[Underlying Feeds]
Chainlink’s BTC and ETH price oracles

[Upper volatility constant]
3

[Lower volatility constant]
1.5

[Volatility Period]
90 days

[Swap Router]
QuickSwap’s Polygon address

[Liquidity Pool - Capacity]
USD 250k

[Liquidity Pool - Maturity]
180 days

[Liquidity Pool - Early Withdrawal Fee]
10%

[Liquidity Pool - Buy-Sell Price Spread]
10%
author: 0xA2716e6Af5d4B5f7Ff1F3Df99E681Eb917B4A3D1
